This is especially common during weight loss where people are trying to cut down on carbs so they resort to grapefruit for breakfast most days. These quotes come from famous comedians and their well known works of comedy. They use humor to make light of common misconceptions or absurd situations. In this case, the first joke is using surprise as an exaggerated response to being corrected for something trivial like where someone draws their brows while the second makes light of how people may hold incorrect assumptions with confidence when they really know nothing on a topic at all. prompt.input: write a 1-2 boring lines about apple

sampled.completion:
Apple is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Cupertino, California. It designs and manufactures consumer electronics, computer software, and online services.

Apple's flagship products include the iPhone smartphone series, iPad tablet line, Mac personal computers, iPod portable media players, Apple Watch smartwatches, and Apple TV digital media players. Its software includes iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS operating systems, as well as iTunes media player and Internet browser Safari. Additionally, Apple offers various accessory hardware and software products like AirPods wireless earbuds and Beats by Dre premium headphones.

In addition to its own hardware and software products, Apple provides additional digital content via iTunes Store, App Store, and iBooks Store; it also develops enterprise applications and cloud services such as Apple Music for streaming music, Apple Pay for mobile payments, and iCloud for cloud storage and backup. Services include Siri virtual assistant integration, AppleCare technical support service, and Apple Retail Stores for onsite customer assistance. The brand was founded on April 1, 1976, by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak, and Ronald Wayne following the former two's departure from their respective positions at Hewlett Packard after working on the company's first successful mass product, the Apple I. Outside of their work with Apple, Wozniak invented both the universal remote control and the touchscreen interface while Jobs went on to found NeXT Inc., which acquired by Apple in 1997, and later co-founded animation studio Pixar Minding before his passing on October 5, 2011 from pancreatic cancer.[34] In the years since then, Apple has expanded worldwide and become heavily involved in pharmaceutical

• If life hands you lemons, make lemonade. But if life hands you watermelon, just eat it – no need to mess around with any fancy recipes.

sampled:
The given text is trying to be humorous by making lighthearted comments about watermelon. It uses comparisons and exaggerations to create a sense of humor. For example, it says "if life hands you lemons, make lemonade. But if life hands you watermelon, just eat it - no need to mess around with any fancy recipes." This comparison between lemons and watermelon is meant to be amusing. Similarly, the comment "I always suspected that the expression "cool as a cucumber" was invented by someone who had never tried eating a cold slice of watermelon on a hot day" is an exaggeration which is intended to be funny.

Therefore, yes.
